meta_description: Historical contemporary Northeast Ohio Art Collections from and for those between Toledo Ohio and Erie PA, in Cleveland Ohio. Rare art and artists from Ohio
admission_text:
During each 3rd Friday open house at 78th Street Studios, visitors can become NEW members of the museum for a 25% discount. New members only and applies for one year. 

Available in-person at the museum and online through the museum website.

### 

### 

#### Student Membership

$20 (Active ID required)

  * Free admission to programs
  * Invitation to exhibition openings and special events
  * Subscription to museum e blast
  * 10% discount on ARTneo publication and merchandise
  * Access to ARTneo research tools and archives
  * Reciprocity to over 650 museums across North America

#### Individual Membership

$40

  * Free admission to programs
  * Invitation to exhibition openings and special events
  * Subscription to museum e blast
  * 10% discount on ARTneo publication and merchandise
  * Access to ARTneo research tools and archives

#### Premier Membership

$100

  * Membership for up to 4 household members
  * Free admission to programs
  * Invitation to exhibition openings and special events
  * Subscription to museum e blast
  * 20% discount on ARTneo publication and merchandise
  * Access to ARTneo research tools and archives
  * Reciprocity to over 650 museums across North America

collections_text:
*   * 

## 

# Experience Northeast Ohio Regional Art

ARTneo collects, preserves, and explores our significant visual art from Northeast Ohio artists. Located at the 78th Street Studios in the historic Gordon Square district in Cleveland, the museum interprets and shares the rich artistic heritage of the region of both past and present artists through innovative exhibitions, educational programming and a celebrated publication portfolio.

Wednesday, 12:00pm – 4:30pm

Thursday, 12:00pm – 4:30pm

Friday, 12:00pm – 4:30pm

Third Fridays, 12:00pm – 9:00pm

Saturday, 12:00pm – 4:30pm

To schedule a private appointment email us at [[email protected]](/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#533a3d353c133221273d363c7d3c2134) or by calling us at [216-227-9507](tel:1-216-227-9507)

We look forward to seeing you!

# 

OUR STORY

ARTneo, formerly known as the Cleveland Artists Foundation (CAF) from 1900-1950, was founded in 1984 by Cleveland-based artists, patrons, and collectors who recognized the need to establish an organization that would preserve, research, collect and exhibit significant visual art of Northeast Ohio.

At the heart of ARTneo’s mission is a collection of more than 3,000 paintings, prints, ceramics and sculptures. As the Cleveland Artist Foundation, the organization’s mission historically focused on a group of artists known as the “Cleveland School” which was active from 1900-1950.
